website_summaries.verdict: While you'll pay up for it, this large-monitor looks impressive and is designed to limit eye strain.
pros: Features Game Mode technology for smooth images and 3,000-to-1 contrast ratio for vibrant colors
Curved screen results in less eye strain
cons: Does not come with built-in speakers

customer_reviews.title: Faded outline!!!! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the screen I noticed this outline when the screen was not showing anything remotely dark or patterned. Any dark or black screen has this ugly faded outline that has gotten worse. It looks terrible and makes watching and playing things on it almost unbearable. I expected better from Samsung. Should’ve returned it when I first bought it because now I have to go get a new one. At least I know not to get another Samsung. This picture does not do it justice. It also leans forward. Had to use a couple programming books to prop it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: As the proud owner of a Samsung 65” curved screen TV, I was eager to try a smaller version for my Mac Mini, so I purchased this. The first thing I noticed was how light it was - so light I began wondering if it was a quality product. Although it looked and felt flimsy, it worked ok at first. The third time I tried to turn it on, however, it would not power up; it was dead. Based on my experience, Samsung’s TVs are absolutely incredible, but their computer monitors are junk.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Love these monitors
customer_reviews.text: Love these monitors. I've got a duo setup on my desk and I can't believe how much eye strain these things save me. It took a total of maybe 2 hours to get used to the curve look, but it makes my desk feel more roomy and comfortable without blowing my eyes out trying to look 54 inches across my desk just to look from one end to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor, Excellent Quality, and Excellent Value.
customer_reviews.text: The Monitor is Excellent... I have the 27" CF591 Model, and now the CF398 Model. The CF398 has a slightly different refresh rate than the 598 but not a noticeable difference. And The 398 has no speakers. But for me the biggest difference that in my opinion is a game changer is the 598 isn't natively mountable, you have to buy an adapter. I purchased the adapter with was metal fitting into the plastic backing of the monitor and it just is not sturdy and I am afraid the Monitor will break. The 398 is mountable with no adapter... And the Monitor mounts well and is extremely sturdy. This Monitor is a steal for the Money.
customer_reviews.author: Darren LoPresti

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Eye Fatigue
customer_reviews.text: These are the best monitors I have ever used. The eye saver setting has helped reduce the eye fatigue and headaches. I bought two for my home office (I work from home about 40% of the time) and they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I can see!  I can see!
customer_reviews.text: Using this monitor for my laptop. Getting old and blind. Laptop screen very small. This monitor has made a huge difference for me. My biggest worry was editing text. Was afraid text would be too pixelated. But it all worked out great! Characters look just fine. Videos and web apps look great as well. Would very much recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Chittum

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great. You’ll get used to the curve quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected and in great shape. Easy to set up. Took about 5 minutes. Picture quality is great. Took a day of using salesforce and making calls with it to get used to the curve but now I do not even notice. Great little joystick on the back right corner for easy power/menu and picture settings access. Can also control volume from there. This monitor turned out to be a much better option than dual monitors for my WFH setup. What a difference in productivity from the small laptop screen I was staring at! Would definitely recommend especially if your company reimburses you for tech purchases!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Feel taken
customer_reviews.text: Worked for an hour then lightning strikes horizontally across the screen. Tried to seek help but nothing. Bought two of these but think they are blowing these out as I am unable to get anyone to talk to me about it, return it or replace it. So very unlike Samsung and Amazon. Super disappointing. Put my old Samsung on the desk. At least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled stand cannot be removed for wall/arm mount
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star but for the most ridiculous stand clamp. I had it on a stand and then wanted to remove the stand to mount t it on a arm but there is no way to remove the stand once you have assembled it. So I had to open the back screws which basically broke the led screen... I am very upset because it was less than a month old and every other Samsung or any other company monitor or tv allows you to remove the stand for mounting easily
customer_reviews.author: sri

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with these. I'm a software developer, and I use them 8 to 10 hours a day. The picture is sharp, the size is perfect, and I quickly adapted to the curve. Now that I'm used to the curve, I wouldn't want to work without it. My only complaint is the enormous power brick which cover adjacent outlets on my power strip. They probably could have come up with a better design for this. I ended purchasing a second power strip just for the monitors. Otherwise they're a great buy and I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: 27 inch and FHD!!!! mmeh!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 27' QHD monitor and wanted to add one more next to it. Since this was on discount I went with this one. Being an avid gamer, IT professional and a part time photographer I personally feel that all monitors above 23' should be defaulted to QHD. FHD ona 27' monitor looks pixelated. Also the VA panel is not as amazing as it looks on paper. I tried various color setting on the monitor but none seemed corrent. For light use I would recommend this monitor but if you are sitting in front your monitor for more than 5 hours I would suggest exploring some QHD monitor with IPS panel.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal P

customer_reviews.title: On my 2nd replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have a computer chair that can take 3 monitors, so I bought 3 of these. 1st one went after a month. Now 2 years later the 2nd one is going. In the last 2 years I've had the monitors on for a total of 30 hours. Unbelievable. Problem is I didn't buy a warranty and I can't buy a different model because they all must match so I have to keep buying and this time with a warranty! I love Samsung and usually never have a problem but not this model: LC27F398FWNXZA
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sound distorted
customer_reviews.text: sound frequently distorts/becomes static filled, generally requiring a full restart of the computer to get back to normal. If I "wait it out" audio is no longer synced to the source. Issue doesn't come from speakers, as they work fine with other monitors and I have all drivers up to date. Tried to get a replacement from amazon, who also determined the issue to be the monitor and they said they couldn't because it was a deal of the day, which is it's own form of bizarre. Was told to wait to talk to amazon until after the 30 day return window to "hopefully" take advantage of the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: saeval

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first time I order this it wasn’t as described. So I returned it and tried again. This time I get sent an empty box. I won’t be trying for a third time. Unbelievable and ridiculous! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Woods

customer_reviews.title: Clear, sharp display.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upsize my pc monitor because my vision is changing and I wanted to avoid reading glasses just to see my computer screen all day for work. This screen is larger, without being overwhelming. I use my pc for reading email, creating documents, and viewing and editing photos. Really satisfied with the overall look and quality of the display. I'm not tech savvy, but I like sharp images, black blacks, and accurate, vibrant color. This monitor did not disappoint. A few reviews mentioned having a hard time adjusting to the curved lines in numerical spreadsheets, but I didn't notice this at all, so it may be an individual thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A.

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I sure was looking forward to receiving this monitor. Then when I hooked it up, there was a black bar about 1.5 inches wide top to bottom on the right side. The site on the screen was not shrunk -- the black bar covered the view. I tried the monitor on both my laptop and another desktop. Same problem. It was connected by HDMI, but there also was no sound. I called Samsung customer service, and the agent walked me through several steps to try to correct the problem. No luck. He wanted me to pack it up and send it to a service center for repair. No thanks. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Abama

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two at same time. Got two different styles
customer_reviews.text: Ive owned these for 6+ months now. I purchased them at the exact same time and received two completely different styles (still no response from seller) Two different styles of plug-in for hdmi/display port and the power connection. Both monitors came with completely different power supplies One monitor sits flush while the other is crooked. The crooked monitor. The entire screen is slightly shifted and is not a flush 90 degree corner from pixel to frame. That too is crooked Also to note. I have a Bi-Pod stand for the screens. The crooked screen one sits a good 1/4 inch higher than the one built correctly Will edit with pics later
customer_reviews.author: Jared D. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: great for the job
customer_reviews.text: As you can see I have a tri setup of these monitors, they work great. easy tosetup easy to use. I never had any problems with the setup. The do run a little long width wise but i'm overall happy. I threw out the stands and mounted them on the table mount for a 3 monitor setup. I still have room for 3 more above them but for now I think more then 3 monitors for me would make me distracted. I am setting up a home office with these monitors aswell. I think that for the amount of money its worth doing a muiltiple curved monitor setup with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked fine though the colors and brightness are a bit
customer_reviews.text: Bought it during black friday, it worked fine though the colors and brightness are a bit.. weird. It's either too bright, or too dark, colors are either too muted or too vivid. There's no happy medium. Today however the top half of the screen is covered in black & blue dead spots, nothing I can do fixes this. Might be just a defective monitor from get-go, but I wouldn't buy a second.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding buy, outstanding monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I can't believe the quality of the screen for the price I paid. Color reproduction is outstanding. The curve... oh the curve.. I'll never buy a flat screen again! 1800 curve is the way to go. I use this for work, gaming and Photoshop that I use for complex processing needed for Astrophotography. I couldn't be happier. There is nothing to complain about. Some complain about the resolution of fonts and I don't understand. Some about the stand not being solid enough - are they in earthquake prone areas- buy a solid desk.
customer_reviews.author: GpnmoabTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Text Pixelated and large pixels. Decent if bought on sale
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i connected it I noticed that the text was pixelated. The once straight lines in my games had tiny boxes in them and i could see the pixels. The picture it a little distorted because of the camera but you can see how large the pixels are. With images it's not noticeable but the text you could see the pixels in the letters. I've purchased the LC27JG50QQNXZA instead with the WQHD. This was $159 at the time of purchase so hard to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Legion Honey

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: Not a gamer. I needed this for a simple PC for working, reading and watching online videos. Works just fine. 27 inch screen size is great for my desktop needs. Not crazy about the control stick menu interface but that's a minor point. The only reason I rated this 4 out of 5 is because the one thing which this monitor lacks is a stand which allows you to at least tilt the screen up or down.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month now, and HIGHLY RECOMMEND it. The picture quality is outstanding, and brightness and contrast are excellent. I am not a videophile, but I recently had a friend over that is. He was blown away with this monitor, especially when I told him the price. He is a graphic designer and notices far more in a monitor's performance than I do. If he loved it, it's a great monitor. I plan to buy a second one (two monitor set up for work). I am not a gamer so I can't speak to its ability there, but otherwise this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: christy m

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, decent price, built to last
customer_reviews.text: 2 years + of all day/night gaming, Netflix, browsing, etc - I have not shut it off since it arrived and it looks/acts like the day it arrived. This is as good as a 60hz screen is gonna look, as durable as they come, and Samsung has always had the best blacks (I use Acer, Asus, ViewSonic, et al) for movies/gaming too. Easily among my favorite purchases from Amazon (i.e., one of the precious few that did what it claimed to do and is what it claims to be). For the money, this is the best you can do, imo.
customer_reviews.author: G.H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!*****
customer_reviews.text: Curved screen provides better immersion. The picture quality is out of this world clear. I'm so impressed! It's very thin and slim bezel. Was a snap to connect, plug and play. And for the price . . . was a steal! Will be buying a second one for my wife's laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Read directions people! Please! I absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.text: So I waited a few months before leaving review. Since so many have had issues with these. I absolutely love them!!!! I bought one when my main monitor went out and was gifted a second one for Christmas. They help my eyes more than expected. Why I think people are having issues. It is extremely specific on method of putting the leg base on. If you don’t follow directions precisely you will be putting pressure onto the screens in ways it’s not suppose to have. Which will cause pixels dying and screen failing all together.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The screen is great, I use it for work and it has a very clear picture. I love the eye saver mode, reducing blue light. The only reason this is less than 5 stars is that the item arrived with a crack in the screen. Fortunately, it’s not in a high-volume area, but it is distracting and disappointing given the price for a new product that had lots of packing materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Knoerr

customer_reviews.title: Great overall monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go video editing and after calibrating it to what RTINGs recommended, it was a great looking monitor. Good size, gentle curve, and colors. I wanted something with a slightly higher refresh rating and at 27", I wanted something above 1080p, but this was still a good buy. I ended up replacing it with a Viotek 27" monitor and love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about gaming, but for scrolling twitter, checking email, and buying more "stuff" on amazon, this monitor is a great value for less than $200. My 12 year-old Dell monitor finally lit its last pixel this week, and this new Samsung is looking great. I hope this one lasts at least 12 years, as well. It worked right out of the box, from power up. No adjustments were needed. Fast, simple and back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Civil Engineer and work on many CAD projects. No matter how big the lap top you buy, things are just tight fit on the screen. With this monitor and my one laptop its a perfect setup. The screen looks amazing and makes for a better drafting experience. Easy to assemble, it comes in three parts the base is two parts held together by a single screw (Philips) and then the monitor itself just clicks on to the stand. I would recommend this screen to anyone who is gaming or doing any kind of design work. My wife wants one for herself after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: D Calli

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, can't remove the stand insert.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, but there doesn't seem to be a way to remove the plastic holder for the stand in the back. I bought a third party stand that uses the mount but since that plastics in the way I can't tilt as far down as I would like too :/ wonder too if it couldn't sit flush against a wall? Just something to keep in mind when choosing your stands/mounting system.
customer_reviews.author: toffeeCoo

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 and I’m thinking about a third!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my Mac and the other for my PC. I work from home for a software company, and I spend countless hours using these monitors. They are awesome. The images are super clear, they’re a great size for office space and my gaming has been so much more enjoyable too. I highly recommend these monitors. A friend of mine in my area told me about them and I’m not looking anywhere else now!
customer_reviews.author: jason atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great. I bought it for working at home through COVID. The screen looks amazing and I love the curve. When I first set it up, the monitor leaned down a bit, I tried to see if it tilted but was too aft to push too hard. I put blocks under the front legs to get it where I wanted. However, last night I was rearranging and by accident, I somehow got it to move! So this does tilt which I’m so happy about! I love it and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shoponAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Best 1080p monitors I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was the best price on a 27" on Prime Day, so I took the plunge and bought 2. I thought the curve would be noticeable, but after using these several hours a day, I might notice they are curved once when I sit down. There is no time needed to adapt, you will forget about the curve within minutes. They also look great with 2 side by side. The color, brightness and contrast puts my old monitors to shame. I have these as the bottom 2 monitors on a 4 monitor setup, and I think I'm going to need to get 2 more just to make them all look this good.
customer_reviews.author: Sr. Vos

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, cheap stand.
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor but the stand is as basic and cheap as it can get. I have to physically elevate the front feet to get a proper viewing angle. There is no adjustment to the stand. It's a solid piece of plastic. Default position points the monitor at a downward angle. A paperback under each front leg and the viewing angle improves 100%.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Deals and steals... I won in this one
customer_reviews.text: This was one of those rare finds! I love this display, everything is crisp and clear ready in the eyes, which I didn't even realize I was experiencing eye strain and best, the price was fantastic! Unboxing it, I was concerned about some of the reviews I've read however I have had nothing bad happen. I'm sure it was thrown around quite a bit during it journey to mine.. the packaging was very secure.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK

customer_reviews.title: Piece of blurry junk
customer_reviews.text: Now that I know the best buy with Amazon is a joke. This cheap, wobbly monitor in useless. You can barely read the text because of it's blurry resolution. I saw the review that warned me not to buy but because it was an Amazon best buy I got it. Big mistake, I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: grau

customer_reviews.title: A great external monitor for gaming or work
customer_reviews.text: When I started working from home, I needed two external monitors. I bought these. I really like the curved design. The bezel is non-intruding and a small size. The picture quality is really good and the refresh rate is good as well. I liked this monitor so much, I bought two more for my vacation home. An excellent buy. Watch for price drops as it can fluctuate depending on demand.
customer_reviews.author: Wil R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid monitor, not physically adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Monitor has great picture and color. Stand is completely non-adjustable however. Not a show stopper if you want to use it with a third party monitor stand though. Using for a gaming monitor paired with a NVIDIA 970 video card. Perfect for my use as I didn't want to move up to 2k or 4k monitor as I knew it would require an upgraded video card. I do not notice it being only 1080p on such a large monitor unless i'm really looking close. No ghosting for gaming that I am able to discern. Not the thinnest bezel, but it's also not the most premium monitor. Good value for the money if you pick it up on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B

customer_reviews.title: I need a  mother return label too get my $$$  back.from  Samsung!!?  Thanks Zack a real
customer_reviews.text: I finilly got it to working!!///9" moniter and this one to.. Left all on overnight, and the next morning it was working!!! Man this is a Great 4 K picture!!! I LUV it!!! A old happy man/// Zack It .. Now I mailed it in fof service.. mGanuintreed 1 year...Not a good product so far...??? I probally won"t buy Samsung product again,,,Wish I wouln"t have bought this moniter..Maybe it will work on newer Computers???/// I don"t know or care!ng product again!!!!!! My Bro in Laws Samsung T.V. Went out 2 times = had to fix it...
customer_reviews.author: zack davis

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were my first external monitor for my home office set up. Once you open the box, you can tell the monitors are not as well built as other Samsung products. Resolution is decent, don't expect Dell, HP or Macbook type resolutions. It gets the job done. Don't recommend these for video editing or graphic work. The curve is a good feature if you have 2 of them side by side, which gives an immersive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zaed Ejaz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - slow to wake
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to replace 2 older Samsung 23 inch monitors. They look great. I like it that they have an "night time" or "eye saver mode". The curve is subtle and have mostly gotten used to it. All around pretty nice monitors. The only reason I give them 4 stars and not 5 stars is that, like me, they are slow to wake up. Sometimes it takes 20-30 seconds for them to come on after I've been tapping the keys or moving the mouse around. It's not a day-ruining problem, but annoying nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for consoles / watching videos
customer_reviews.text: Great price and including vesa mount is big. I use it as a monitor that swings out over my bed for watching tv and playing console games while lying down. I would not use it as a main monitor for my pc since it is 1080p and 60hz but it works great as a media or console display. For main pc monitors I would highly highly suggest that you get a 1440p or 144hz+ 1080p monitor, or if you have the budget a 1440p 144hz+ monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance for his bday and he loves it! He is a huge PC gamer and always wanted a curved monitor. This was a great value and a good size for his gaming needs. A very well trusted and known brand too, hence why I chose it. It has a nice clean crisp picture and no issues running his PC games such as Call of Duty Modern Warefare, Borderlands 3, etc. He is also able to connect is PS4 to the monitor but he mainly uses it for PC. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Darienne

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of these over the past two years on a 6 monitor setup. 2/3 have gone bad with black lines appearing on the screen. Tested voltage from video card and it is okay, including the 6year old monitor plugged in to the same card. I also run a power conditioner/voltage regulator.
customer_reviews.author: The Wyoming Fox

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently broke a 32" inch LG monitor I purchased on Amazon for around the same price. I downgraded in size to this 27" curved monitor and I'm super happy with this purchase. The 27" is better suited for PC gaming use and the curved monitor makes for a more immersive experience. The picture quality is amazing and if you use a AMD graphic's card the monitor support "FreeSync" The monitor stand is a bit flimsy but gets the job done! I recommend for anyone who loves playing games and watching movie's on PC. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: BaltimoreActual

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great from all angles.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like the stand because it stands out too far in the back preventing me from putting it close to the wall. I ended up removing it and hanging the monitor from a wall bracket. Don't like the rotating button in the back to turn it on and make screen adjustments. My last Samsung monitor had the controls under the bottom edge that you couldn't see but it was much easier than reaching behind and rotating on this old game handheld type. But the picture is nice and I can see clearer from more angles. Once I got it set-up, I really don't have much use for the button.
customer_reviews.author: Coke

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Color Reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Color reproduction was lackluster compared to my old Asus panels. Everything had a noticeably washed out appearance despite every combination of settings. I also noticed a slight flicker on some images. I really liked the curved design, though.
customer_reviews.author: AnonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor for the price--I like the curve and it has decent resolution, etc. Make sure you get it set up correctly for the computer and OS you have installed. Windows 10 drivers could be updated but I haven't found them yet as I think they could make it a bit sharper overall. If you're hesitating--go ahead and try it out--I think you'll be happy with it overall!
customer_reviews.author: Hawk BB Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Screens
customer_reviews.text: I have the 32'' of these at work so I figured I would get the 27'' for home. These are some sweet screens! Love the curve feature, really makes work easier and more pleasant. Could not be happier with the quality and I love how they have the VESA holes in the back so I could mount them to my desk mount. Looks great and always get compliments. Very happy with the Used ones as well, they were brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Curved monitor
customer_reviews.text: Samsung 27” curved monitor has nice curved look and color imagery is great when viewing photos and videos. Good enough size provided have the space for 2 monitors. I have no feedback regarding gaming experience since not a gamer. Pros: definitely good size large but not too large; color display great; sleek look; nice navigational toggle button in back. Cons: inputs in back are limited (only 1 HDMI); no speakers. Would recommend monitor to others. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lecorps

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Right now, monitor prices seem a bit crazy and this monitor is excellent for what I need. The HDMI and display ports are definitely nice to have. The monitor is large and covers field of view, excellent resolution and Samsung quality i have come to expect from the the last 30 years Besides gaming, it is used for work from home and has been very easy on the yes for 8 hours at a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Sreif78

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing for 2 monitor setups
customer_reviews.text: Our legal staff uses 2-monitors and when I replaced one assistant's aging monitors with these we ended up buying 6 of them. Side-by-side it is the best setup for reducing eye-strain and putting a lot of information in front of you without having to swivel your neck around. By 2 pm with 22 inch monitors I was having to use my reading glasses but with these 27 inch monitors the glasses stay in the case. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: TechShopper34684

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: The curved screen are great. I wasn't sure what I was going to think of them, but using them for just a few minutes and I love that I feel like the data on the screen conforms more to how I work. I actually have two of these, one of each side of a standard flat screen and it gives my desk a great wrap-around feeling. I work from home and site in front of these monitors for 8+ hours a day. For the money, they are a great screen.
customer_reviews.author: D-911-guy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Monitor Fo Sho
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is bigger than I thought, and man oh man does it know how to display pixels well. High quality monitor, no doubt about it. Never quite sure what curve is supposed to do for a monitor, but it definitely doesn’t hurt at all. Good quality, brightness is chill, haven’t had an issue with it for the last 6 months of use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Neal Connell

customer_reviews.title: Good buy to compliment your WFH experience
customer_reviews.text: Great for working from home. I was worried about the screen size going from a 34" bit it's worked out. Much better than one small 12" screen. Easy to navigate settings and menu. Loses some resolution when displaying some files in full screen mode but generally very clear. Screen is not as curved as other models but not a huge issue. The stand is a bit awkward and would have been great to have adjustable height but I placed on a stand and it's worked out well. 4+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: armichic

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when I telework, as I use my laptop and two monitors at work. It is lightweight, easy to set up, has a really nice, bright, clear picture, and cane with an hdmi connector! Very convenient to include an hdmi connector so I didn’t have to look around my place for the one I bought 2 years ago. The curved 27” screen is a perfect substitute for 2 monitors, as I can easily fit two documents side-by-side on the screen at full readability. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice bright curved monitor. The curve helps not have a reflection on the monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is part of my work-from-home office upgrade. My old monitor started burning out. This is a nice upgrade. I've used this for two weeks and I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: WGE G'Dad

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and loved it so much I bought a 2nd. These are awesome for gaming or movie watching. never thought I would like having two monitors on one PC but it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ken

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: The auto source detection on this monitor is absolutely trash. I bought these as dual displays and have two PCs connected. I need to readily put one unit to sleep and boot the other up. The issue is the monitors fail to recognize that the second source has booted up despite the monitors entering hibernation before I switch. It's 2020 and these monitors are from 1960. Thoroughly disappointed with the accessibility of this monitor. Appears to be a systemic samsung issue and they have no interest in fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Monitor was purchased with the expectation it is of lower quality and I was fine with that. But what I didn't expect is that when the monitor is powered up for the 1st time everyday, it has erratic white lines that shoot across the screen until it gets warmed up. I contacted Samsung support and they sent a return label and handled it as they should. All in all for 150 bucks I am happy with it. But it is what you should expect and that's a cheap monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve o

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need 4K, this is the monitor to buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a fan of Samsung products, unless you buy the very high end versions. Even then, I've seen lots of problems. Not with this monitor. It's quite beautiful and surprisingly sharp and crisp for the price. I bought a couple of them, I liked it so much. If you need 4k for graphic work, it obviously won't work, but for $179 I can't imagine finding a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Dan V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor bicycling
customer_reviews.text: It's (so far) a good deal. Picture is just fine for my use: attached to a laptop linked to a bicycle trainer. Picture is superior to what my laptop provides and the "wrap-around" feature adds to the realism during the ride. Product is 5 stars. Packaging is 4 for using styrofoam- monitor is fragile but there are alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Great, low cost monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my home office. I think very highly of Samsung monitors, this one replaced an old monitor that died after many years of use. Actually, I think it cost less than the old one! Picture is brilliant, clear, curved screen is different to get used to, but vision is great, so I am happy. I do not use it for gaming so did not rate it for that. I would make this purchase again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought another screen from amazon, but I found out that the size was small. So, I returned that screen and I bought this one. The screen is awesome, and it really functions properly for me. Some things to know about this item: - The screen is 27 inches big and I really like its size. - The screen is curved (I loved this feature). - The screen is fixed, meaning that in order to rotate the screen in any direction, you'll have to move the whole thing with its stand. I do recommend this item!!! God bless
customer_reviews.author: Levi (saved by grace)

customer_reviews.title: Great screens, wobbly base
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these beautiful monitors and am thrilled with the picture quality and brightness. However, the base they sit on is not nearly as stable as they should be. Even as I type this review, they are both shaking just from the impact of my fingers on the keyboard. It gets worse when I'm writing. I only use them for work. I am happy for what I need them for. However, they would NOT be my choice for gaming because the wobble would drive me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Offered me truly immersive viewing experience!
customer_reviews.text: Good Product with so many unique features! Slim design with high glossy black finish and innovative T-shaped stand Curved Monitor is exactly what I want for my home. I really enjoy streaming on it. Ultra slim design, curved screen, fast-responsive time, brilliant picture quality, and eye saver mode is what that enforce me to order this Samsung monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't I owned a curved monitor before now?
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the monitor and the display of everything from gaming to my art on the monitor. I have never owned a curved monitor before and I recommend it for anyone. The only downside is that I brought mines used and their is two or three dead pixels on it. It's a small bother yet I hope that it's fixable so that I don't have to replace the monitor because of two or three dead pixel lines because I do love my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Asheley Ward

customer_reviews.title: Initially worked okay but then went bad after using 3 days a week within a month!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as I needed this monitor for my office and thought a Samsung would last well. Thanks to Amazon's policy and warranty I was able to send it back. I also wanted a monitor that could not only be adjusted up and down but also tilt back and forth and swivel. I replaced it with a Dell. So far that is working well.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Curvy, thin, light, good looking, what's not to like?  Liked em so much, I got two more!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW - STILL 5 STARS AFTER GETTING TWO MORE MONITORS ORIGINAL REVIEW - 5 Stars Got two of em, as a programmer these are great. They display well once you flip a few settings around (like every panel with default settings). I don't care for the Eye Saver...washes things out. My laptop has a night-mode feature to decrease blue-light already.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 4 months later
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor (Samsung LC27F398FWNXZA ) for about 4 months and it stopped working today. A technician at Samsung Support insists that it is caused by physical damage after I repeatedly told him the image of cracks on the top right corner are NOT physical cracks. It is just a image. I am sending it back to Samsung Repair Center and see what they say about it. It costed me $219 and lasted only 4 month. NOT HAPPY AT ALL :(
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal from Black Friday 2017
customer_reviews.text: After a year of having these screens (I bought two), I'm satisfied with the displays. They're not 100% uniform, but unless I'm concentrating on the difference I don't notice. It's just a slight brightness difference between the two even though I've got them both on the same settings. I'll chalk it up to my docking station somehow distorting the signals. I definitely recommend these to anyone needing a nice home office setup.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder_3kgt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a great value. Do not let the fact that this is not an IPS display scare you away.The amount of curve is perfect. Personally, I enjoy using this monitor for spreadsheet work. I got used to the curved quickly so it does not bother me for text. Text does look a little bit pixelated if it is large. My only complaint is that there is only tilt adjustment (no height adjustment).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Within a month of usage I noticed a few dead ...
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of usage I noticed a few dead piexes.Sadly, I was just out of the return date. The low resulation of 1080p on a 27 inch monitor results in eye strain. I would not by again. Spend the extra $50 or so for a 2k or 4k monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Pauli

customer_reviews.title: Blurry, no adjustments couldn’t fix it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for home office use. It was blurry right out of the box. I’m technically inclined, so no biggie. I adjusted everything, and still couldn’t get it to not be blurry. This is *not* the monitor to buy if you expect it to work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: JustJenn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE! Samsung quality and at this price WOW
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early (always nice) and setup was ridiculously easy. I LOVE the quality - it is one of the best monitors I have owned and I worked for a monitor manufacturer for 20 years! This is a high quality product and at a fantastic price. I highly recommend this if you want a large curved monitor - this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The specifications on Amazon says it has a D-Sub connector, it does not
customer_reviews.text: It comes with one HDMI input and one DP-IN, which I have not been able to get to work. If you are expecting a D-Sub connector because that is in the specifications you will be disappointed. Its fine as long as all you want to do is use the single HDMI input. If you plan to connect it up any other way, you will be disappointed because the D-Sub does not exist and the DP-IN doesn't seem to work for most people.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The monitor itself is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The monitor itself is amazing, a definite upgrade from my old 21.5in acer monitor from 2007. The problem about this though, the reason why its not a 5 star, is because its not adjustable unless you plan to buy their company's mounts which is only usable for their own products. Also when left standing on a flat surface (table, etc.) the monitor slightly leans forward because there is no actual knob/screw to keep it securely in place. The reason it stands is because there is a little part that slips into the stand which bends diagonally keeping the monitor up, hence there reason why the monitor slightly leans forward.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny N.

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: I was comparing MANY different monitors, and must have overlooked a VERY important thing about this item. It does NOT have a remote. Period. And no built in speaker. This is by definition the most bare bones you can get. The monitor was easy to set up, and looks pretty good. BUT you must be prepared to try to do everything (setup, switching, volume, etc) by reaching around the back of the unit. I just wish I could turn it off and on with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: DCarmickle

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: No drivers to load and fuss with, I just plugged in the HDMI cable and it was ready to use. I made adjustments to color balance, contrast and brightness and was done. It has eye saver mode which I probably should use, but I enjoy the brilliance and color with it off so that's the way I use it at least for the time being. At this price it's a tough monitor to beat.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6 of these. 3 have failed so far. Just stopped working, get super hot. Granted, samsung is relatively easy to work with and they honor their warranty, but cmon... its been two months. For office use, its great. Maybe for budget gaming it would suffice, but for the hassle, just get a cheaper viotex or whatever with higher refresh and res.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like these monitors a lot. Setup was quick and easy. Selection for input source is intuitive. Wide, yet lightweight enough that my $50 stand doesn't sag. My only complaint is that I didn't get three, since games center on the screen. If you extend your gaming window to cover both screens for an immersive experience, the focus of the action is right where the monitors split. Otherwise you don't even notice the split.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Russell

customer_reviews.title: Apple users beware!
customer_reviews.text: On MACOS, screen may look blurred/low resolution. MacOS Mojave doesn’t show option for 1920xanything at all. Only shows 720p, 1080p, 1600x900, and 1080p looks low res and blurry/large. Apple forums don’t seem like Much help and Neither does Samsung’s website
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, Clear Displays - Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The monitor's resolution and quality was amazing. - The colors are sharp, bright, and contrasts very nicely - The pictures are sharp and vibrantly colored - The curve is well angled, no issues with it at all
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Monitors have a blank screen because of a hardware issue according to Samsung support
customer_reviews.text: Monitors are supposed to be plug-and-play. I bought two of these monitors. Neither of them are working. The power light comes on, but they have a blank screen. I chatted with Samsung support, and he recommended having them both repaired, because it is a hardware issue. He gave me support requests for both monitors. I'm just going to return them to Amazon. I don't recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: dhkruse

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor to use for productivity. However I also use it for videos and light gaming. It does not have the stats of the high dollar gaming monitors but it is amazing nonetheless. For the money the image that this monitor produces is stellar. The contrast is spot on and no calibration had to be done right out of the box for my purposed. I am planning on getting one more to have a matched set for my new job. Great quality for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear picture....I'm up close and personal!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I waited and purchased this computer screen on Amazon vs. with Best Buy.....they beat the price by almost $60. This is a nice clear screen with great resolution. I wear reading glasses most times but don't have to use them when working on this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economic, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I host a small office space with 10 of these units, haven't had any trouble (a few odd lines the first couple minutes of use on some refurbs, but nothing since). Last 4 have been new. They are our largest quantity of monitors at the office and also our most popular so we keep going back to them. Not sure how well these stack up for a trained eye, but as a casual user to knock out some emails they do the trick. Curved screen is a nice feature that you get used to quickly. Priced well in my opinion - good size, curved, ok quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: But we don't use this for gaming I am very very happy with this product. I think it was a good value for the money the picture quality is beautiful the sound is great and we don't even have speakers attached to it so yeah overall I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the office
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor at my office when I dock my laptop. It has a nice, crisp output and the size is perfect for my desk. I mainly use it for office applications, and it does a good job in that role. The Display Port connection is nice as it will work with my Surface Dock without the need for an adapter, just a mini-DP to DP cable. I don't find the curve distracting for my work, but can see how some may when it comes to things like Excel spreadsheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sean G.

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment..
customer_reviews.text: First of all: at the price point of160$ i thought it will be fine. After a week of using it, i always noticed the text pixelated in word and excel programs. Today i turned monitor off and bam.. red, orange, yellow vertical lines filled half of screen. Huge disappointment.. i am sending this back. Buyers please be aware, if you are looking for a monitor with crisp texts and color, this is not the correct option. I regret it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I just get this Curved monitor as my principal against my S27D360 27'', and have a good quality, for gaming, for programing, for work, everything. i have 5 month with it and i love it. if you want to buy it, do not think it twice, I am a very selective with monitor, and this one did the job. by the price very impresed, but if you wanna get a high valuable monitor for everything, fo gor (Samsung C27HG70 27") but this one, can affort that.
customer_reviews.author: Mblack47

customer_reviews.title: Very nice screen
customer_reviews.text: Plugged right in and lit up. The auto adjust on this was right on target. I use my computer for work and gaming and have found this does very well in both situations. I have other Samsung screens, such as their TV's, and found the quality, durability, and performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D. Boehmler

customer_reviews.title: came home one day to see  all of the pixels at the bottom gone
customer_reviews.text: worked okay for a while then developed pixel issues now :( and its not in the budget to buy anything right now :( Spoke to customer support who was awesome thanks dileep b, let me know I have a 3 year warranty and I should carry it in to any service center
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the brightness and size of it. No problems. Very pleased with this purchase. Being able to see multiple documents on screen at the same time is great with a much better view.
customer_reviews.author: PeterCW

customer_reviews.title: Leftmost monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has the best picture quality I have ever had so far. Running at 2560x1440, and combined with the quality of the screen, I cannot emphasize how much I love gaming on this thing. I also watch shows, and youtube, and its far and beyond my favorite way to watch things. Assembling the monitor was straightforward and easy, and even has a mounting slot if you choose to not use a standard monitor stand, and wish to put it on a wall, or bracket it to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Frisenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor. Beautiful picture and I really liked the curved screen. I ultimately returned it for a Samsung 4k because I need the extra real estate on the screen. For anyone who only needs 1080 resolution, this is perfect. Still gave 5 stars because it was not the fault of the monitor that I decided to go for a higher resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: I always had a flat screen monitor but this is great when playing games. It is just different than a flat screen, it appears my eyes aren't as strained after awhile with this curved feature. I need to make the television in the family room curved too.
customer_reviews.author: 1Time

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the sharpness of picture
customer_reviews.text: Resolution is terrible. This is one of three on my desktop and this one is more of a soft focus like it was zoomed. I'm working with it, hoping the factory settings were wrong but not much hope. Really considering boxing this thing up and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Krakatoa Dublain

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem like it is 27" - feels like smaller. But beautiful images and love the eye saver mode. Watching video is a breeze. Simple plug and play device that solved a whole lot of demand for a big screen.
customer_reviews.author: Expatriot
